subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: After a series of difficult and crash-filled oval events, Sunday’s race on the 3.4-mile, 11-turn road course in Watkins Glen, N.Y., could not come at a better time, especially for the series newcomers.
snippet: After a series of difficult and crash-filled oval events, Sunday’s race on the 3.4-mile, 11-turn road course in Watkins Glen, N.Y., could not come at a better time, especially for the series newcomers.
